sentence.Network_en: A few years ago Tom Brown's Schooldays was serialised on television.
sentence.Network_cn: 几年前《汤姆·布朗求学记》曾作为连续剧播出过。

sentence.Network_en: She hadn't seen Laura since her schooldays.
sentence.Network_cn: 她自从离开学校就再没见过劳拉。

sentence.Network_en: Life often seems to be marked off into different periods: schooldays, marriage, old age.
sentence.Network_cn: 生命似乎分为三个不同时期: 学生时代, 结婚, 老年.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the film carried me back to my schooldays ., 这部电影把我带回到了我的学生时代.
these photos made me think back to my schooldays ., 这些照片使我回想起学生时代.
in her autobiography she occasionally refers to her unhappy schooldays ., 在她的自传中 , 她多次提到她不快乐的学习时光.
I often reflect on my schooldays .我经常回忆起我上学的日子。

list.abs: His schooldays were hellish ., 他的学生时代苦不堪言.
photographs made me think back to my schooldays .这些照片使我想起我的学生时代。

Ethan Frome has been forgivably overlooked by your list's compilers , who perhaps developed a deep aversion to this oft-studied tale of unrelenting misery in schooldays .《伊坦·弗洛美》没被列入清单是情有可原的，编选人也许对在学生时代常研读的这种苦难重重的故事逐渐产生出深切的厌恶感。
My interest in stamp collecting dates from schooldays ., 从学生时代起 , 我对集邮就开始感兴趣.

entry.def: Your schooldays are the period of your life when you were at school.

example.ex: He was happily married to a girl he had known since his schooldays.
example.tran: 他与一个学生时代就认识的女孩幸福地结婚了。

means.word_mean: 1. the time of life when you are going to school

auth_sentence.content: It is a common memory of most of our schooldays - the kid who was uncannily good at every sport.

sentences.cn: 他的学生时期是一场苦难。

sentences.en: I often reflect on my schooldays.
sentences.cn: 我经常回忆起我上学的日子。

sentences.en: Life often seems to be marked off into different periods: schooldays,marriage,old age.
